title: Bug 6536 - 'Add Javadoc on field in TH' action does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, nothing happens.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, the action should add the Javadoc for the selected field. Alternatively, the 'Add Javadoc' option can be removed from the context menu if it is not intended to add Javadoc to fields.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view
2. Select a field in the view
3. Right-click on the selected field to open the context menu
4. Select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu
